name: Chilling Penalty
description:
When the character uses a Normal Attack: If this character has at least 6 HP remaining, this Skill costs 1 less Cryo Die, deals +1 DMG, and deals 1 Piercing DMG to themselves.
If the character has no more than 5 HP, deals +1 DMG and heals the character once the Skill is finalized for 2 HP.
Usage(s): 2
